Landing.platformDescription: Link shortening, domain hosting, email manager and open api, everything you need to build better.
Landing.urlShorteningDescription: 📖 Instantly transform long, unwieldy URLs into short, memorable links that are easy to share. Enjoy built-in analytics to track clicks, monitor performance, and gain insights into your audience—all in real time.
Landing.freeSubdomainHostingDescription: 🎉 Kickstart your online presence with free, fully customizable subdomains. Whether you're launching a personal project or testing a business idea, get started quickly with no cost and reliable hosting you can trust.
Landing.emailReceiversSendersDescription: 📧 Seamlessly receive and send emails from any email provider with top-notch security. Stay connected and manage your communications effortlessly, knowing your data is protected with robust encryption and privacy features.
Landing.multipleDomainsDescription: 🤩 Empower your business with the flexibility of multiple domains, such as wr.do, uv.do, and more. Establish a strong digital footprint, create branded links, or manage diverse projects—all under one unified platform.
Landing.websiteScreenshotApiDescription: 📷 Capture high-quality screenshots of any webpage instantly with our powerful Screenshot API. Integrate seamlessly into your applications, access third-party services, and unlock advanced features by applying your unique API key.
Landing.metaInformationApiDescription: 🍥 Extract rich, structured web data effortlessly with our smart Meta Information API. Perfect for developers, businesses, or researchers, this tool offers seamless integration, third-party service access, and enhanced functionality.
Landing.pricingDescription: Use it for free for yourself, upgrade when your team needs advanced control.
Landing.freeBestFor: For hobbyists and individuals looking to manage their links
Landing.enterpriseBestFor: For large organizations with custom needs

Setting.Generate a new API key to access the ope: Generate a new API key to access the open apis
Setting.This is a danger zone - Be careful !: This is a danger zone - Be careful !
Setting.This action cannot be undone - please pr: This action cannot be undone - please proceed with caution
Setting.This will permanently delete your accoun: This will permanently delete your account and your active subscription!
Setting.Enable subdomain apply mode, each submis: Enable subdomain apply mode, each submission requires administrator review
Setting.Set system notification, this will be di: Set system notification, this will be displayed in the header
Setting.Select the login methods that users can: Select the login methods that users can use to log in
Setting.Enable email catch-all, all user's email: Enable email catch all, user can use email address which created on this platform to register
Setting.Set catch-all email address, split by co: Set catch-all email address, split by comma if more than one, such as: 1@a.com,2@b.com, Only works when email catch all is enabled
Setting.Set Telegram bot token, Only works when: Set Telegram bot token, Only works when Telegram pusher is enabled
Setting.Set Telegram group ID, split by comma if: Set Telegram group ID, split by comma if more than one, such as: -10054275724,-10045343642
Setting.Set Telegram email message template: 设置 Telegram 邮件消息模板
Setting.Set Telegram push email white list, spli: Set Telegram push email white list, split by comma, if not set, will push all emails
Setting.Enable eamil suffix limit, only works fo: Enable eamil suffix limit, only works for resend email login and email password login methods
Setting.Set email suffix white list, split by co: Set email suffix white list, split by comma, such as: gmail.com,yahoo.com,hotmail.com
Setting.Send email notifications for subdomain a: Send email notifications for subdomain application status updates; Notifies administrators when users submit applications and notifies users of approval results; Only available when subdomain application mode is enabled
Setting.How to get the R2 credentials?: How to get the R2 credentials?
Setting.maxStorageTooltip: Set maximum storage capacity for this bucket (in bytes). If not set, uses plan quota global limit.
Setting.Publicize this storage bucket, all regis: Publicize this storage bucket, all registered users can upload files to this storage bucket; If not public, only administrators can upload files to this storage bucket
Setting.How to get the S3 credentials?: How to get the S3 credentials?
